channel.title: How to stop from flagging?
channel.description:
(Kind of a noobish question...:)
How do I stop my server from flagging every single item that i put out?
It gives me an error saying that the accounts may contained duped items so i have to deleted the held items, deleted the flagged account and then start over again...?
How do i edit this so it doesn't flag and i can use those specific items?
-Thanks in advance

item.title: How to stop from flagging?
item.dc:creator: @masterlegit masterlegit
item.description:
@masterlegit wrote:

I am using a rsprivatserver that is all i know it is just a regular server… can you give me a better client to run it on? what would you recommend?

I tried to delete that but it did nothing it still gives me this as a txt file in the flagged folder:

[FLAGGED]
This account might contain duped items
character-password = 66-26-169-14-7-159-163-38-182-73-79-129-42-209-62-121
[EOF]

Read full topic

item.title: How to stop from flagging?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

find this

ScanItems(); // Xerozcheez: Catches dupers

and delete it and that should stop it from scanning the items

hope this helps

Read full topic

item.title: How to stop from flagging?

item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

what client are you using?
